name: Xue Bin Peng
content: Xue Bin (Jason) Peng Xue Bin (Jason) Peng I'm an Assistant Professor at Simon Fraser University (SFU) and a Research Scientist at NVIDIA. I received a Ph.D. from UC Berkeley, advised by Professor Sergey Levine and Professor Pieter Abbeel. Prior to that, I received an M.Sc from the University of British Columbia, advised by Professor Michiel van de Panne. My work lies in the intersection between computer graphics and machine learning, with a focus on reinforcement learning for motion control of simulated characters. I have previously worked for Sony, Google Brain, OpenAI, Adobe Research, Disney Research, Microsoft (343 Industries), and Capcom. Prospective students: Information is available here. Codebase MimicKit A framework with implementations of our motion imitation methods in one convenient place.
